  • Constructor Details

    • BitcoinGlobalNetworkScenario

      public BitcoinGlobalNetworkScenario(String name, long seed, long stopTime, double averageBlockInterval, int confirmationDepth)
      creates a Bitcoin network scenario with parameters close to real-world but excluding transaction simulation for better simulation speed
      Parameters:
      name - determines the name of simulation scenario
      seed - this value gives the simulation seed value for randomness engine
      stopTime - this determines how many seconds of simulation world time should it last.
      averageBlockInterval - This determines the interval between two block generations in seconds.
      confirmationDepth - The depth at which a block is considered confirmed (eg. 6)

  • Method Details

    • createNetwork

      Creates the network and populates it with miners and nodes almost equal to the real world.

      createNetwork in class AbstractScenario

    • insertInitialEvents

      protected void insertInitialEvents()

    • simulationStopCondition

      protected boolean simulationStopCondition()
      Stops simulation after `stopTime`
      Specified by:
      simulationStopCondition in class AbstractScenario
      Returns:
      true if stopTime is passed
